0010100011010100 0100101110111001 0 -> sum: 0111010010001101, cout: 0

0011100010000101 1010110010111111 1 -> sum: 1110010101000101, cout: 0
1100011000011111 1000010101100110 1 -> sum: 0100101110000110, cout: 1
0101110011110010 1101010001011010 0 -> sum: 0011000101001100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
